name: codePushDeploymentReleases_create
description: Create a new CodePush release for the specified deployment

deployment_name.description: This specifies which deployment you want to release the update to. Default is Staging.

description.description: This provides an optional "change log" for the deployment.

disabled.description: This specifies whether an update should be downloadable by end users or not.

mandatory.description: This specifies whether the update should be considered mandatory or not (e.g. it includes a critical security fix).

no_duplicate_release_error.description: This specifies that if the update is identical to the latest release on the deployment, the CLI should generate a warning instead of an error.

release_upload.description: The upload metadata from the release initialization step.

id.description: The ID for the newly created upload. It is going to be required later in the process.

token.description: The URL encoded token used for upload permissions.

upload_domain.description: The URL domain used to upload the release.

rollout.description: This specifies the percentage of users (as an integer between 1 and 100) that should be eligible to receive this update.

target_binary_version.description: the binary version of the application

body.description: The necessary information required to download the bundle and being the release process.

$ul: **release_method**: The release method is unknown if unspecified
